title: A Particularly Appealing Madewell Sherpa Jacket Is on Sale
text:
1 item in this article Photo: Courtesy of the vendor.

There are a lot of teddy-sherpa-piled-fleece-what-have-you coats to choose from out there in this great wide world of ours, but we are particularly taken with this one. That’s because its pointed collar gives it the silhouette of a chore coat (and if you know us at all, you know we love a chore coat), it’s cropped enough to get away with acting like a cardigan, and though it’s already on sale at Madewell, you can take an extra 20 percent off with the code YOUCHOOSE. (Note: You can save 30 percent off your total order if you spend over $200 — meaning this coat would be just $88 — so if you want to throw in this cozy sweater or these stretchy boot-cut jeans, there’s actually some incentive to do so.)
